          <title>
            <string language="ca">Les àrees i els recursos</string>
            <string language="en">Areas and resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiche und Betriebsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zones et ressources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Áreas e recursos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zone e risorse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοχές και στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull d'experiències docents i de tipologies de treball de les diverses àrees d'Educació Infantil: psicomotricitat, hàbits, racons, ordinadors...</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of teaching experiences and work methods at different teaching areas at nursery level: physical education, habits, corners, computers, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències</string>
            <string language="en">sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung unterrichtende Erfahrungen und 
Arbeit Methoden an den unterschiedlichen unterrichtenden Bereichen auf
Baumschule Stufe: Leibeserziehung, Gewohnheiten, Ecken, 
Computer, usw..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'expériences et de méthodes 
d'enseignement de travail à différentes zones d'enseignement au 
niveau de pépinière : éducation physique, habitudes, coins, 
ordinateurs, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de experiências e de métodos 
ensinando do trabalho em áreas ensinando diferentes no nível do 
berçário: instrução física, hábitos, cantos, computadores,
etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di esperienze e di metodi 
d'istruzione del lavoro alle zone d'istruzione differenti al livello 
della scuola materna: formazione fisica, abitudini, angoli, 
calcolatori, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή της εμπειρίας διδασκαλίας και των μεθόδων 
εργασίας στις διαφορετικές περιοχές διδασκαλίας σε επίπεδο 
βρεφικών σταθμών: φυσική αγωγή, συνήθειες, γωνίες, 
υπολογιστές, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
